item.title: Effective Remote Working
item.description: In this article I will share with you some tips for working remotely. Setup a Single Source of Truth Establish a readable document for you and your team to reference. Keep your documentation as up to date and as terse as possible, people won’t want to read huge multi page documents unless they are a speed reader. To do this, I would recommend using a cloud based text editor or another collaborative program.
